about_the_game:
Fuga: Melodies of Steel OST Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 is on sale!

Volume 2 of the Fuga: Melodies of Steel original soundtrack contains a total of 30 tracks from music duo LieN, including the ending theme Memories of the Earth and Skies, and in-game BGM tracks such as the French versions of Elegy of Winds and Ensemble, 3 tracks from animated comedy spin-off Fuga: Comedies of Steel (I'm Not Alone, Morning Sunshine, A Little Happiness Forever).
(Total play time: 51 minutes, 17 seconds)
Follow the music and see where the children's journey ends.
